arts.ttl: Diego Simeone hails Barcelona after Atlético’s shock defeat to Leganés
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid head coach Diego Simeone has on Saturday moved to reveal his appreciation for Hansi Flick’s Barcelona side. Atléti are of course fresh something of an outing to forget…

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti hits back at Diego Simeone over Real Madrid comments
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti has on Saturday responded to the recent comments laid out by Atlético Madrid counterpart Diego Simeone. For those who may have missed it, Simeone…

arts.ttl: Antoine Griezmann the villain as Atlético Madrid see historic win streak ended by Leganés
arts.sum: A fresh twist in the La Liga title race was forthcoming on Saturday evening. This came owing to developments in the meeting between Leganés and Atlético Madrid. Diego Simeone’s table-topping…

arts.ttl: Griezmann misses penalty and Atletico's record win streak ends in 1-0 loss at Leganes
arts.sum: Antoine Griezmann missed a 90th-minute penalty and Atletico Madrid’s club record of 15 consecutive wins ended following a surprising 1-0 loss at Leganes in La Liga on Saturday. Griezmann had a chance to at least snatch a point for the league leaders after a video review awarded Atletico a penalty for a handball by defender Sergio González.

Atletico Madrid currently sit top of La Liga and haven't lost a game in all competitions since late October. Leganes sit just three points above the relegation zone, drawing their previous fixture. ...

arts.ttl: ‘For 100 years’ – Atlético boss Diego Simeone aims major dig at Real Madrid over officiating
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid head coach Diego Simeone on Friday took advantage of the opportunity to aim a less-than-subtle jibe at capital rivals Real Madrid. As much comes after the Argentine was…

arts.ttl: Official | RB Leipzig confirm permanent capture of Arthur Vermeeren: “Very comfortable in Leipzig from day one.”
arts.sum: RB Leipzig have confirmed the permanent purchase of Belgian midfielder Arthur Vermeeren.

arts.ttl: Arthur Vermeeren makes RB Leipzig move permanent
arts.sum: RB Leipzig have announced the permanent signing of Belgian midfielder Arthur Vermeeren (19) from Atlético Madrid.

Atletico Madrid currently sit top of La Liga and haven't lost a game in all competitions since late October. Leganes sit just three points above the relegation zone, drawing their previous fixture. ...

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid dealt injury blow ahead of Champions League return
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid made it 15 wins in a row on Wednesday as they defeated Elche in the Copa del Rey, but that result did come at a cost for Diego Simeone, who will be without his most clutch player for a little while. Alexander Sorloth netted twice against Elche, although he was withdrawn at half […] The post Atletico Madrid dealt injury blow ahead of Champions League return appeared first on Football España.
